thread.title: Carbon Express Intercept Supercoil Crossbow Kit
thread.title_full: Carbon Express Intercept Supercoil Crossbow Kit

title: Carbon Express Intercept Supercoil Crossbow Kit

organizations.name: carbon express intercept supercoil crossbow kit top

text:
Top Comments Features 
As a lightweight version of the Intercept Axon LT, the Intercept Supercoil LT is also a top of the line crossbow that features a unique, military AR-style design. Built on the Intercept Chassis, the Intercept platform uses the same reliable, modular component system as AR black guns. This gives the Supercoil unlimited potential for customization because it can accommodate almost all military and commercial AR parts. With multiple connection points for accessories on the 29" Picatinny Rail you can customize the stock, grip, foregrip, scope/sight, sling, quiver, and other critical areas to achieve a personalized length of pull and proper, full-view eye relief for an optimized custom fit. Combined with precision engineering and devastating speeds of 360+ fps, the Intercept Supercoil LT gives you absolute confidence to make your best shot. Lightweight, compact design for shooting in tight spots (13.5-inch axle to axle when cocked) Precision engineering and advanced features, including a CNC machined trigger box housing with precision internal components and anti-dry-fire mechanism with no-creep trigger that achieves a clean break at a pull weight of just 3.5 lbs 4x32 deluxe multi-reticle lighted scope with red/ green dual illumination for varying light conditions 360+ feet per second, 122 ft-lb kinetic energy, 175 lbs draw weight, 13.5-inch power stroke Military AR-Style Design Three-position AR style fixed butt stock with comfortable butt plate Built on the Intercept Chassis 29" Picatinny Rail Imported 
Shipping Note: Shipping to Alaska, Hawaii, APO addresses and PO Boxes is not available for this item.
